alert.note: Alert for Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:03PM CDT until June 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TOM GREEN COUNTY... At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Twin Buttes Reservoir, moving northeast at 25 mph. This storm is strengthening and will be moving across the southern and southeast sides of San Angle. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lake Nasworthy around 610 PM CDT. San Angelo and Goodfellow Air Force Base around 625 PM CDT. Wall around 630 PM CDT. Veribest around 645 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
